FuncDef:
The mpls te p2mp-mode command enables P2MP RSVP-TE and switches the tunnel from the default P2P mode to the P2MP mode.
The undo mpls te p2mp-mode command restores the TE tunnel to the P2P TE mode.
By default, the MPLS TE tunnel mode is the P2P TE.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The interface tunnel command configures an MPLS TE tunnel in the default P2P mode. The mpls te p2mp-mode command switches the P2P TE tunnel to P2MP TE tunnel. After the switching is completed, leaf nodes can be created on the P2MP TE tunnel.
Prerequisites
Create a tunnel using the interface tunnel command.The tunnel has been specified as an MPLS TE tunnel using the tunnel-protocol mpls te command.MPLS P2MP TE has been enabled globally using the mpls te p2mp-te command.

Follow-up Procedure
Run the mpls te leaf-list command to create leaf nodes on the P2MP TE tunnel.
Precautions
The undo mpls te p2mp-mode command deletes all configurations about the P2MP TE tunnel.
